    • Class com.github.sarxos.webcam.WebcamPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • repaint

          Runnable repaint
          This runnable will do nothing more than repaint panel.

        • imageRenderingHints

          Map<K,V> imageRenderingHints
          Rendering hints to be used when painting image to be displayed.

        • executor

          ScheduledExecutorService executor
          Scheduled executor acting as timer.

        • rb

          ResourceBundle rb
          Resource bundle.

        • drawMode

          WebcamPanel.DrawMode drawMode
          The mode of how the image will be resized to fit into panel bounds. Default is WebcamPanel.DrawMode.FIT
          See Also:
          WebcamPanel.DrawMode

        • frequency

          double frequency
          Frames requesting frequency.

        • frequencyLimit

          boolean frequencyLimit
          Is frames requesting frequency limited? If true, images will be fetched in configured time intervals. If false, images will be fetched as fast as camera can serve them.

        • frequencyDisplayed

          boolean frequencyDisplayed
          Display FPS.

        • imageSizeDisplayed

          boolean imageSizeDisplayed
          Display image size.

        • antialiasingEnabled

          boolean antialiasingEnabled
          Is antialiasing enabled (true by default).

        • webcam

          Webcam webcam
          Webcam object used to fetch images.

        • updater

          com.github.sarxos.webcam.WebcamPanel.ImageUpdater updater
          Repainter is used to fetch images from camera and force panel repaint when image is ready.

        • image

          BufferedImage image
          Image currently being displayed.

        • starting

          boolean starting
          Webcam is currently starting.

        • paused

          boolean paused
          Painting is paused.

        • errored

          boolean errored
          Is there any problem with webcam?

        • started

          AtomicBoolean started
          Webcam has been started.

        • defaultPainter

          WebcamPanel.Painter defaultPainter
          Default painter.

        • painter

          WebcamPanel.Painter painter
          Painter used to draw image in panel.
          See Also:
          WebcamPanel.setPainter(Painter), WebcamPanel.getPainter()

        • defaultSize

          Dimension defaultSize
          Preferred panel size.

        • displayDebugInfo

          boolean displayDebugInfo
          If debug info should be displayed.

        • mirrored

          boolean mirrored
          Is image mirrored.
